import React, { Component } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { connect } from "react-redux"; class NavBar extends Component { render() { const { cartTotalQuantity } = this.props.cart; // const { favTotalQuantity } = this.props.favorites; return (

OnlineShop

{cartTotalQuantity}
); } } const mapStateToProps = (state) => ({ cart: state.cart, }); export default connect(mapStateToProps)(NavBar);
